titleStmt.title: The expert phisician learnedly treating of all agues and feavers, whether simple or compound, shewing their different nature, causes, signes, and cure ... / written originally by that famous doctor in phisick, Bricius Bauderon ; and translated into English by B.W., licentiate in physick by the University of Oxford ...
Pharmacopée. English
titleStmt.author: Bauderon, Brice, ca. 1540-1623.
Welles, Benjamin, 1615 or 16-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
